name: This Isn't Even My Final Form
name_original: This Isn't Even My Final Form
description:
Description

Submission for PGM - Power Jam.

You play as an ill-tempered office worker who recently had his sandwich stolen by a coworker. Engage in an action-packed battle against this sandwich thief in a challenging top-down bullet hell shooter. But be careful, he may be hiding power levels unbeknownst to you.

IMPORTANT NOTE: WebGL version runs very poorly because the game is in need of severe optimization. If the frame rate is too low, download and play the windows version in the "Download" section below.

Credits

All programming, artwork, and design was done by Saba Kalandadze
